about_the_game:
Expand your journey through European grandeur with the latest Château Royale Jigsaw - Expansion Pack 1! Dive deeper into the world of opulence with 16 brand-new puzzles, each more enchanting than the last.

From lavish castle interiors adorned with golden chandeliers to serene royal gardens teeming with vibrant flora, this DLC offers fresh challenges and breathtaking scenes. Assemble intricately designed puzzles ranging from 40 to 300 pieces, perfect for both casual puzzlers and seasoned pros.

Unlock more of Europe’s hidden aristocratic treasures and illuminate new sections of the beautifully illustrated map as you progress. Each completed puzzle reveals a piece of history, transporting you further into the majestic charm of royal life.

Elevate your Château Royale Jigsaw experience with this exciting new expansion, and continue your exploration of Europe’s most iconic estates—one exquisite piece at a time!
